name: PensionCoin

attributes.documentation: Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add
